BK I dropped the elf beccause he is an elf, right? Seems an odd thing to say to another elf
I think I hate you, elf. I think this is your fault.

BK Cerric, please, remember! We played together as children! We picked flowers and climbed trees. We made the kinds of promises to one another that only foolish children could make.
BK added last name Maethellyn because that's what she said in earlier
BK cut " and get on with it already" sounds modern
And thus ends our working relationship, dear elf. Say your goodbyes to your dear elven friend. Your time together is limited.
I was but a young child, angry with her parents for not allowing her to see her best friend.
One day I was approached by a band of drow asking for supplies and shelter. I knew they were evil, but yet... Out of some misguided wish to punish my parents, I gave them the way to our village.
They killed many... and those they didn't kill, they took as slaves. Zinsianna took me. She treated me well, like a favored pet. But my family fought back and died slow deaths.
I do not know. This is the only life I have known for a century. I am not sure I have a place on the surface anymore.
Yes, I suppose I am. Though after a century of servitude, I am not precisely sure what that means.
Illydia, I imagine you seek forgiveness and reconciliation, but I am not certain I can offer those things. I am a broken man, left now with no one to help me put myself back together.
Perhaps, one day. For now, I wish to seek my own truth. You have, at the very least, given me that opportunity.
BK I softened this... he's not super warm and fuzzy yet. Perhaps, one day. For now, I wish to seek my own truth. You have, at the very least, given me that opportunity.
Because of my failure, he lost everything. And because I came hoping for his forgiveness, he has lost his life.
The drow raided my village, killing or enslaving my people. They took my family and myself as slaves, and... I never saw my parents, or Cerric, ever again.
Let us leave this place. For I will be returning here in my dreams for months to come.
Of course she does. If it is in her plan for me to suffer more, then that is what I shall do.
Cerric is ALIVE and (Obviously) not hostile
Cerric is DEAD and was FRIENDLY
Cerric is DEAD and was HOSTILE
BK No place is safer than any other for me. As long as I stay away from the drow, I should be as safe as I can be.
You have given me a new life, Illydia. I do not know what that will bring, but I know it was you who granted it.
